content: a lacy girly baby blanket perfect for beginners uses only basic stitches but comes out looking far more intricate download contains 2 versions picture heavy and printer friendly finished dimensions approximately 31x42 difficulty easy knowledge of basic stitches required pattern includes repetitive stitch patterns simple color changes pattern format pdf pattern style written us crochet terms this is a bright and scrappy original design you do not have permission to sell or distribute this pattern or use the images you do have permission to sell any items you make with this pattern and credit for the design is greatly appreciated
